entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning then changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
